\w After|strong="H4480"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* departed, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Abram, “\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w*,
